file-not-found.connection: Please check your connection and try again.
file-not-found.header: Couldn't find file named at path:
file-not-found.title: File not found

about.slogan: Quickly build customized dictionaries for your language!
about.text: Mother Tongues Dictionaries (MTD) is the first dictionary app suite for low-resource languages that combines a language agnostic design, customizable approximate search, cross-platform deployability (Web/Android/iOS), and open-source access.

bookmarks.body: Sorry, you don't have any bookmarks.
bookmarks.bookmarked-instructions: To save an entry to your bookmarks, click on the bookmark icon beside it that looks like this:
bookmarks.title: Bookmarks
bookmarks.unbookmarked-instructions: A bookmarked entry will have an icon that looks like this beside it:

browse.showing: Showing entries {{ startIndex }} to {{ endIndex }} of {{ length }}

home.slogan: Welcome to the {{ value }} Mother Tongues Dictionary!
home.sub-slogan: To get started, click on the search button above, and start learning!

random.button: Click here to see 10 random entries

search.no-results: Sorry, we couldn't find any words that match '{{ value }}'. Please try something else.

word-modal.audio-instructions: Click on the audio below to listen to '{{value}}'
